Title: Response to Cult of the “I”
Abstract: © 2018, Emerald Publishing Limited.Purpose: The purpose of this paper is to respond to an earlier article in the Journal of Documentation: The Cult of the “I”. Design/methodology/approach: The method is a form of critical response. Findings: Numerous problems regarding the The Cult of the “I” article are discussed. Originality/value: This paper puts forward views about the iSchools Movement.
